channel.title: Testing Roles :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Unit Testing Roles Routes Now that weâ€™ve created a basic unit test for the /api route, we can now expand on that to test our other existing route, the /api/v1/roles route. Once again, there is only one method inside of this route, the GET ALL method, so the unit tests should be similar between these two routes. The only difference here is this route is now reading from the database instead of just returning a static JSON array.
